name: Cat Herders: Couch Coop Cat Corralling!
name_original: Cat Herders: Couch Coop Cat Corralling!
description:
Cat Herders is a 1-4 player, split-screen coop game. It's about herding cats. Each level has a goal, and your job is to get the troublesome cats into that goal as quickly as possible using a variety of fun items!

HERD!

Use items like tuna, your computer keyboard and Cat Snax™ to draw cats towards the goal. Use scarier items like a barking robot dog to push them in whichever direction you please. Use more chill items like the music box to put them to sleep while you figure out a plan of attack. Use the cat trap to move multiple cats quickly! Create chaos with the cat cannon!

COOPERATE!

Coordinate with your friends in 2-4 player split-screen (Steam Remote Play/Parsec friendly!) to get the cats to the goal as quickly as possible.

SET RECORDS!

Compete to finish each level in the fastest time with gold, silver and bronze medal times. We'll add online leader boards in the future!

SPOOKY!

New Halloween map! Herd cats in the abandoned medieval village while being hunted by the spoopy ghost cat!
